title: Election Hacking, Part  2
description: Georgia's elections infrastructure had been hacked multiple times since 2014 - both by Russian Intelligence and local White Hat hackers. The upcoming elections are plagued with uncertainty - and uncertainty and democracy go together like wet hands and electrical outlets.
content:encoded: Georgia’s elections infrastructure had been hacked multiple times since 2014 – both by Russian Intelligence and local White Hat hackers. The upcoming elections are plagued with uncertainty – and uncertainty and democracy go together like wet hands and electrical outlets.
